dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 is a dataset of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10
